name: dnd-style-builder
description: Custom Bootstrap theme builder for DndInator

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy:fonts && powershell -Command "Copy-Item dist/dndinator-theme.css ../DndInator/wwwroot/css/ -Force"
scripts.deploy:expanded: npm run build:expanded && npm run copy:fonts && powershell -Command "Copy-Item dist/dndinator-theme.css ../DndInator/wwwroot/css/ -Force"
